author: lorrainel268
title: Fans of the Roger Smith Hotel
text: My husband and I stay at the Roger Smith a couple times each year and have done so for several years. We're definitely fans. Great location in mid-town. Love the style of this solid historical hotel, surrounded by art, with book shelves in each room, friendly staff and free yogurt, granola and apples. We regularly recommend it to friends who are always pleased with their stays. We'll be back!
